title: Jagged Spear
content:
Tortured creatures may receive Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The point of this spear is blackened and melted - the uneven metal is designed to catch deep in the wounds it creates.

Spear Thrown Versatile
